title: T. J. Bonner
text: T.J. Bonner was the president of the <a href="National%20Border%20Patrol%20Council">National Border Patrol Council</a> (NBPC) until March 8, 2011 when the delegates attending the NBPC convention elected a new president. This organization is a <a href="Trade%20union">union</a> that represents over 16,000 <a href="United%20States%20Border%20Patrol">United States Border Patrol</a> agents.
